page.title: 14WOODBURY
page.content: The information in the following pages was gathered by a questionnaire compiled by the members of the V1th form of St. Peter's school. There are a variety of occupations and from the replies we received, we found that 24% were business men;20% retired 10% housewives ; 6% farmers ; 6% teachers ; 6% Royal Marines; 26% others.This is the average income per annum :17% below Â£5000; 36% Â£5_10,000; 17% Â£10_15,000; 7% Â£15_20,000; 23% Â£20,000+.(not all people stated their income). The most popular newspapers are the Daily Telegraph and the Exeter Express & Echo with the Exmouth Journal a close second and the Times was third. Most families have pets ,cats being the most popular (47%) and dogs the second most popular(42%). Vauxhall was the most popular car with Ford second.
